name: Relegent
overview: Relegent, LLC., a healthcare marketing firm, provides health content and marketing services to hospitals and schools. Its products include Quotient, which includes indices of public opinions on the Internet; direct mail and Internet-based campaigns for various companies; hospitals with a license for consumer content; and Health Teacher, a K-12 health lesson plans and curriculum. The company also provides audit services, such as review of the past, present, and future activities; and marketing services, including creating and implementing marketing strategies, staff augmentation, auditing of processes and recommendations for improvements, and review and implementation of CRM processes. In addition, Relegent offers Discovery Hospital, a consumer health content service for hospitals. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Franklin, Tennessee. As of June 26, 2007, Relegent, LLC operates as a subsidiary of ConnectivHealth, Inc.

acquisition.source_description: ConnectivHealth Acquires Relegent Acquisition Includes HealthTeacher and Discovery Hospital Products
